author: Special Correspondent
text:
Minister for State Highways and Minor Ports Edappadi K. Palanisamy inaugurated different projects such as community hall, anganwadi, common sanitary complex, bore wells all worth Rs. 50 lakh in Vanavasi and Nangavalli areas on Monday.

The Minister inaugurated the community hall constructed at an outlay of Rs. 26.50 lakh from the MLA Local Area Development Fund at Arunthathiyar colony in Vanavasi, and anganwadi (Rs. 7.10 lakh) in ward No. 1; three bore wells with motor pumpset connection (Rs. 8.25 lakh) in Karikkapatti, Sanarapatti and Jalagagandapuram, all in Nangavalli. He also declared open a multi-purpose centre .
title: Minister inaugurates projects
